channel.title: Could I have some help adding a timer?
channel.description:
[i]Well, I've never really done this before, so I don't exactly know what to do!
Base im using: Delta What I want to do: I want it to show how much days of VPS I have left (30) which is 43200 minutes (I think) and 1296000 seconds (I think, lol) and I want it to show it when you log in.
Any help? Thanks ;) [/i]
